class.name: Druid
class.hitpoint_per_level: d8 + CON modifier or 5 + CON modifier

features.name: Spellcasting
features.desc: You know how to cast spells. You can use spells on the druid spell list

feature_data.name: Cantrips
feature_data.desc: You learn 3 cantrips of your choice from the druid spell list. This choice can be changed whenever you gain a character level.

feature_data.name: Spell slots
feature_data.desc: You have limited amounts of spell slots. See your druid's level class features to see how many you're allowed to have

feature_data.name: Prepared spells
feature_data.desc: You prepare a list of spells available to you. See your druid's level class features to see how many you're allowed to have prepared

feature_data.name: Replacing prepared spells
feature_data.desc: When your character takes a long rest, you can change one spell of your spell list with another one with the correct spell slot

feature_data.name: Spellcasting ability
feature_data.desc: You use WIS as your spellcasting ability

feature_data.name: Spellcasting focus
feature_data.desc: you can use a Druidic focus for spellcasting

features.name: Druidic
features.desc: You know the secret language of the druids. You always have the Speak with animals spell prepared. Everyone who knows druidic can spot hidden messages you leave behind, others can only spot it with a DC15 INT check but can't unscramble it without using magic

features.name: Primal order
features.desc: You can choose one of the following sacred roles

feature_data.name: Magician
feature_data.desc: You learn an extra cantrip from the druid spell list, and get your WIS modifier as bonus on INT checks (arcana or nature)

feature_data.name: Warden
feature_data.desc: You gain proficiency with martial weapons and are trained for heavy armor

features.name: Wild companion
features.desc: Using a magic action or by expending a wild shape use, you can cast Find familiar. when you finish a long rest the familiar disappears.

features.name: Wild shape
features.desc: Using a bonus action, you can transform into an animal form you have learned for this feature. this last for half your druid level hours (level 3 would be 1.5 hours) or until you get incapacitated/die. you can also use a bonus action to end wild shape

feature_data.name: Number of uses
feature_data.desc: Check the table to see how many times per long rest you can use wild shape with your current character level.

feature_data.name: Known forms
feature_data.desc: You know a number of beast forms (4 at level 2 (no flying creatures), 6 at level 4 (no flying creatures) and 8 at level 8 (flyig creatures allowed)). When doing a long rest you can replace one of your known wild shapes

feature_data.name: While transformed
feature_data.desc: While in wild shape, you keep your personality, memories, and ability to speak

feature_data.name: Temporary hit points
feature_data.desc: You gain temporary hit points equal to your characters level when in wild shape

feature_data.name: Statistics
feature_data.desc: While in wild shape, your statistics are changed by the beast's stat block. You keep your creature type, hit points, hit point die, your INT, WIS, and CHA scores, class features, languages, feats and your skill & saving throw proficiencies unless the skill & saving throw proficiency is higher on the beast statistics.

feature_data.name: Spellcasting
feature_data.desc: While in wild shape you cannot cast spells. Wild shape does not break your concentration for previously casted spells though

features.name: Druid Subclass
features.desc: Gain a subclass for your druid character

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Wild resurenge
features.desc: Once per turn, when you are out of wild shape slots, you can expend one spell slot to give yourself an extra wild shape slot. this also works in reverse, but only once per long rest.

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Elemental fury
features.desc: You gain one of the following benefits:

feature_data.name: Potent spellcasting
feature_data.desc: You can add your WIS modifier to the damage dealt by any druid cantrip

feature_data.name: Primal strike
feature_data.desc: On each turn in wild shape, when hitting a creature with a weapon or a beast form attack you can give the creature an extra 1d8 damage of one of these types: cold, fire, lightning or thunder

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: You don't get any additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: You don't get any additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: You don't get any additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Improved elemental fury
features.desc: You improve your previously chosen benefit:

feature_data.name: Potent spellcasting
feature_data.desc: When casting a cantrip with a range greater than 10ft, the range increases to 300ft

feature_data.name: Primal strike
feature_data.desc: The extra damage increases to 2d8

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: You don't get any additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Beast spells
features.desc: You can now cast spells that dont use a material component while in wild shape.

features.name: Epic boon
features.desc: You gain an Epic Boon feat or another feat you qualify for.

features.name: Archdruid
features.desc: You gain one of the following benefits:

feature_data.name: Evergreen wild shape
feature_data.desc: When you're out of wild shape uses, and you roll for initiative, you automatically gain one expended use

feature_data.name: Nature Magician
feature_data.desc: Without using an action, you can convert one wild shape slot into a spell slot. Each wild shape slot converts to 2 levels on a spell slot (so exchanging 4 wild shape slots grants you a level 8 spell slot). use once per long rest.

feature_data.name: Longevity
feature_data.desc: You dont age a lot. for every 10 years that pass your body only ages a single year

subclasses.name: Circle of the land
subclasses.desc: You meet in sacred tree circles or stone circles to whisper primal secrets in druidic

features.name: Circle of the land spells
features.desc: After finishing a long rest, choose one of the types of land: arid, polar, temperate or tropical. You know the following spells at each level:

feature_data.name: Arid land
feature_data.desc:
At level 3: Blur, Burning hands, Fire bolt.
At level 5: Fireball.
At level 7: Blight.
At level 9: Wall of stone.

feature_data.name: Polar land
feature_data.desc:
At level 3: Fog cloud, Hold person, Ray of frost.
At level 5: Sleet storm.
At level 7: Ice storm.
At level 9: Cone of cold.

feature_data.name: Temperate land
feature_data.desc:
At level 3: Misty step, Shocking grasp, Sleep.
At level 5: Lightning bolt.
At level 7: Freedom of movement.
At level 9: Tree Stride.

feature_data.name: Tropical land
feature_data.desc:
At level 3: Acid splash, Ray of sickness, Web.
At level 5: Stinking cloud.
At level 7: Polymorph.
At level 9: Insect plague.

features.name: Land's aid
features.desc: Using a magic action, you can expend one wild shape use and grow a 10ft radius sphere of vitality-granting flowers and deadly thorns from a point within 60ft of you. one creature in that range has to make a saving throw taking 2d6 Necrotic damage on fail and half of that on succes. Another creature in that range regains 2d6 of hit points. the damage and healing increase by 1d6 at levels 10 and 14.

features.name: Natural recovery
features.desc: Once per long rest, you can cast one level 1+ spell from your circle spells without using a spell slot. After a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover as well. The spell slots can have a combined level of half your character's level (so a level 6 druid can recover a level 2 and level 1 slot, or one level 3 slot.) and can never be of level 6+. Once you use this, you cant do so again until you finish a long rest.

features.name: Nature's ward
features.desc:
you're immune to the poison condition and are resistant to one damage type associated with your land choice:
Arid: Fire
Polar: Cold
Temperate: Lightning
Tropical: Poison

features.name: Nature's sanctuary
features.desc: Using a magic action, you can expend one wild shape use and grow spectral trees and vines in a 15ft cube within a 120ft range of you. it lasts for 1 minute or until you're incapacitated or dead. All allies have half cover in that area and gain resistance to the same damage as your nature's ward. Using a bonus action you can move the cube 60ft within 120ft of you.

subclasses.name: Circle of the moon
subclasses.desc: You use magic of the moon to transform

features.name: Circle of the moon spells
features.desc: You always have these spells prepared:

feature_data.name: level 3
feature_data.desc: You know the spells: Cure wounds, Moonbeam, Starry wisp

feature_data.name: level 5
feature_data.desc: You know the spells: Conjure animals

feature_data.name: level 7
feature_data.desc: You know the spells: Fount of moonlight

feature_data.name: level 9
feature_data.desc: You know the spells: Mass cure wounds

features.name: Circle forms
features.desc: You can use the moons magic when in wild shape, which gives you the following benefits

feature_data.name: Armor class
feature_data.desc: Until wildshape ends, you have an AC of 13 + your WIS modifier when that AC is higher than the beast's AC

feature_data.name: Temporary hit points
feature_data.desc: You gain temporary hit points equal to triple your characters level when in wild shape

features.name: Improved circle forms
features.desc: You gain one of the following benefits:

feature_data.name: Lunar radiance
feature_data.desc: Each of your wild shape attacks deals normal damage or radiance damage (choose when you hit the attack)

feature_data.name: Increased toughness
feature_data.desc: you can add your WIS modifier to CON saving throws.

features.name: Moonlight step
features.desc: Using a bonus action, you can teleport up to 30ft to a spot you can see. you have advantage on the next attack roll you make on that turn. use this an amount of times equal to your WIS modifier. when doing a long rest or using a level 2+ spell slot you regain expended uses

features.name: Lunar form
features.desc: The magic of the moon grants you these benefits:

feature_data.name: Improved lunar radiance
feature_data.desc: Once per turn you can give a creature an extra 2d10 radiant damage when doing a wild shape attack

feature_data.name: Shared moonlight
feature_data.desc: When you use moonlight step you can take one crature within 10ft of you with you

subclasses.name: Circle of the sea
subclasses.desc: You draw magic from seas and storms

features.name: Circle of the sea spells
features.desc: You always have these spells prepared:

feature_data.name: level 3
feature_data.desc: You know the spells: Fog cloud, Gust of wind, Ray of frost, Shatter, Thunderwave

feature_data.name: level 5
feature_data.desc: You know the spells: Lightning bolt, Water breathing

feature_data.name: level 7
feature_data.desc: You know the spells: Control water, Ice storm

feature_data.name: level 9
feature_data.desc: You know the spells: Conjure elemental, Hold monster

features.name: Wrath of the sea
features.desc: Using a bonus action, you can expend a wild shape to create a 5ft area of ocean water spray around you for 10 minutes. On the next turn you can use a bonus action to force a creature to make a CON saving throw. on a fail they take damage equal to an amount of d6's the same as your WIS modifier. if the creature is large or smaller they also get pushed up to 15ft away from you

features.name: Aquatic affinity
features.desc: The range of wrath of the sea extends to 15ft. You gain a swim speed equal to your speed.

features.name: Stormborn
features.desc: Wrath of the sea gains 2 benefits:

feature_data.name: Flight
feature_data.desc: You gain a flight speed equal to your speed

feature_data.name: Resistance
feature_data.desc: You're resistent to Cold, Lightning and Thunder damage.

features.name: Oceanic gift
features.desc: You can give wrath of the sea to a willing creature within a 60ft range instead of yourself. it still uses your spell save DC and WIS modifier. You can also use 2 wild shapes to get wrath of the sea around yourself AND the other creature

subclasses.name: Circle of the stars
subclasses.desc: You use magic of the stars

features.name: Star map
features.desc: You have your own star map, which can be a scroll, stone tablet, owlbear hide, a collection of maps, a crystal or a glass disc. you can use this map as spellcasting focus. While holding the map you have Guidance and Guiding bolt prepared, and you can cast Guiding bolt without using a spell slot (use an amount of times equal to your WIS modifier). You regain uses after a long rest

features.name: Starry form
features.desc: Using a bonus action, you can expend a wild shape to become a starry form. While in this form you keep your statistics, but your body emits Bright light in a 10ft radius and dim light for 10 more ft. It ends when you dismiss it or when you're incapacitated. Whenever you enter starry form you can choose one of the following constellations:

feature_data.name: Archer
feature_data.desc: An archer appears behind you. Using a bonus action you can make a ranged spell attack, sending a light emitting arrow towards a target within 60ft of you. on a hit it deals 1d8 + WIS radiant damage.

feature_data.name: Chalice
feature_data.desc: a life granting goblet appears on you. Healing spells using a spell slot will heal another creature within 30ft of you of an amount equal to 1d8 + WIS

feature_data.name: Dragon
feature_data.desc: A wise dragon appears behind you. When making an INT or WIS check for concentration, you can make all rolls that are 9 or lower a 10.

features.name: Cosmic omen
features.desc: You can roll a d6 after finishing a long rest. depending on wether the rolled value is odd or even you gain the following reaction:

feature_data.name: Weal (even)
feature_data.desc: Whenever a creature in a range of 30ft makes a d20 test you can take a reaction to add 1d6 to the value of the roll.

feature_data.name: Woe (odd)
feature_data.desc: Whenever a creature in a range of 30ft makes a d20 test you can take a reaction to remove 1d6 of the value of the roll.

features.name: Twinkling coonstellations
features.desc: Benefits improve:

feature_data.name: Archer and  Chalice
feature_data.desc: the 1d8 becomes 2d8

feature_data.name: Dragon
feature_data.desc: You have a flight speed of 20ft and you can hover

features.name: Full of stars
features.desc: While in starry form you're resistant to bludgeoning piercing and slashing damage
